Body.Chapter:
What can it do? The SimplicialSurface-package contains this basic functionality:
Working with simplicial surfaces (and generalisations of that), for example: TODO
Working with edge colourings of simplicial surfaces (for the purposes of an embedding)
Treatment of folding and unfolding for these objects. TODO
We want to show an image of a triangle:
After the image we put another one.
\begin{tikzpicture} \draw[blue,thick] (0,0) -> (2,3); \end{tikzpicture}
This ends our minimal example.
